title: Create a Decision Tree
description: An agent must create a decision tree to help a client decide whether to launch a new product.

tasks.description: Identify the key decision ('Launch' vs. 'Don't Launch') and the key uncertainties ('High Demand' vs. 'Low Demand') with their probabilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly structures the initial nodes of the decision tree.

tasks.description: Assign financial outcomes (payoffs) to each final branch of the tree.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly assigns the payoff values.

tasks.description: Calculate the Expected Monetary Value (EMV) for the 'Launch' decision.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the EMV to help make the optimal decision.
